11.content:
You wake up in a strange room where the windows seemed to be boarded up. What is this place? Where am I? You see a door and walk out the room. The place looks a lot larger than you thought, like a school! You look at your surroundings until something popped up right in front of you!

“Why hello there, new contestant!” In front of you was a strange looking teddy bear that was talking to you! “Wha..! What are you! What is this!” “I am the one and only, Monokuma! And this place is Hope’s Peak Academy!” Your brain was confuzzled with questions! “I know, there’s a lot questions you want to ask right now. Like, how is this bear talking!? Or why am I here!? Don’t worry about who I am! So listen up! I’m about to tell you what you’re doing here and what you’re supposed to do!”

The bear continued to talk to you... “And stop calling me bear narrator! I have a name you know!” Sorry, Monokuma began to tell the rules. “So your the person who got picked by us! There are a bunch of girls here who will try to catch you! If they do catch you, you will be under their control! You won’t be able to do nothin about it and you will follow their commands against your will!”

What!? Against your will!? What kind of game is this!? “So if you don’t want to get caught, then I suggest this. Run and hide for as long as you can! If you don’t get caught for a whole hour, then you win and you’ll be set free! Buuuuuut, if you do get caught, you lose and you be that person’s slave forever! Hahahaha!”

You panicked! Slave forever!? “Wait! I don’t wanna play this!” “Too bad! I’m releasing the girls now! Good luck!” “Wait!” Monokuma immediately explodes! But thankfully you were unharmed somehow! Suddenly, you heard a voice! “Did you hear that explosion!” Out from the corner you see all the girls! “Hey there he is!” Your instincts activated! You ran away as fast as you could! “He’s getting away! After him!” All of them started to run after you!

You managed to lose them! You felt relieve until someone found you! It was...

Well now you know to never run in the halls again! So it’s time for you to get to licking! I’ll even leave the piece of gum on my foot for you to eat! My treat!” Your heart sank! The worst has come! You grimaced harder as you licked passed it to the top of her foot! Then you went back to her heel and licked up, starting all over again!

You kept licking up her salty sole over and over again, reaching new areas that are not licked and tasting more of her god horrible so called foot! It was like real life torture! From which you were trapped in the floor and can’t move and inch even if you wanted to, and forced to lick an actual teacher’s sweaty, gross foot! This can’t even be called detention anymore! It’s so much worse than that title! For a long while you kept licking Chisa’s rank foot when suddenly she gave you a new command! “Time for something new! “Hyyaaaa! Got you!” You were caught! An announcement played. “Attention everyone! The game is now over! Miaya Gekkogahara, the Ultimate Therapist, has won! She now gets to test her new prize in the special while the rest of you sad saps walk out with no prize! That is all! Goodbye!” The announcement ended.

Your heart sank! You were a slave to this girl now! She was short with blue hair and wore a gray headband. She wore a red scarf and a brown jacket. She wore long black socks and gray slippers. She was on a wheelchair with a high tech computer in front of it. On the computer was a strange bunny plushy that was talking to you. She used her computer to communicate with you instead. Her personality was shy and mysterious. She never talked in person.

“Ha! I win! I win!” The bunny on the computer was talking. The bunny was rather cheerful. “Now your my new servant! Yippee! Let’s go to the special room! I want to test you! Follow me!” Miaya drove in her wheelchair and you followed along with her to the special room. You didn’t have control of your body anymore! You had no choice but to keep walking! You two arrived in the special room. There was a lot of electronics and computers everywhere. It’s like the room was made for her. “We’re here! Now we can play!” You didn’t like how she said play! You had a bad feeling about this!

“Now what can we do?”

1432.content:
“I know what we can do! It’s a little something I made just for therapy purposes! Behold!” Miaya pointed behind you. You turn around and see something that was definitely not little! What you saw looked like a giant TV screen, and I mean Giant! Right below it was a comfy looking seat with a futuristic helmet that’s been plugged with many wires. There was also gloves, boots, and a belt that were also connected to wires. You couldn’t believe what you were looking at! “My Virtual Reality Program! Amazing isn’t it? Now let’s get you hooked up!” You were actually gonna try it!? You kind of felt excited! This actually looked very cool!

It took a while but Miaya finally got you all set up. You were sitting in the chair with the helmet, gloves, boots, and belt on with the big screen behind you. Additional wires were also attached to your body. Miaya was wearing what looked like a wetsuit, but was really a virtual suit so she could go in the program as well. “Alright! Are you ready? Here we go!” Miaya pressed a button on your helmet and you drifted to sleep. You immediately then woke up in a strange place. Around you was a bunch of green lines and codes flying around. You were actually in! This was the definition of amazing! But then you heard a loud voice come out of nowhere! “Cool right!?” The voice was so loud and big it echoed! Then, something giant was transporting in right in front of you! You dreaded to see who it was when it loaded up! It was Miaya! She literally was a giant!

“Hi! Here I am! Now that we’re all set up, it’s for you to do me a little favor!” A favor? “Let me explain first. Basically I set up your body with wires attaching all around your body. That way you can feel anything that happens to you on the virtual world!” You were set up, literally! This whole thing was a big setup! “For example, if I step on you!” She lifted her giant leg up and gently stepped on your body, causing you to crash down on your back with her giant foot smothering your body! She was right! Your heart sank! “I basically made my body huge in the virtual world, thanks to my virtual suit! The suit I set you up can’t make you do that sadly. That was to make sure you couldn’t escape! And I can also do this!”

Suddenly her foot became so much smellier! You breathed it in and groaned in disgust! You could even smell it in the virtual world! It smelled so rancid! “I made my foot more stinky by programming it out in the real world! Now you can smell how bad it is! I can also make it sweaty, dirty, grimy, slimy, you name it!” This was a nightmare! Her foot stopped smelling so bad. She must’ve turned it off or something. “So, about that favor, my feet are really tired, so your gonna lick and worship them for me! Hehe!” Worship and lick those enormous feet of hers!? You were filled with dread! She took her giant foot off of you, sat down, and stretched her legs out to your tiny body, with her feet right in front of you! “You’ll be able to taste everything you lick! Even when I make them sweaty or dirty too! Now, let’s have fun!” The nightmare has begun!

“Let’s make them super sweaty first!” At the moment she said that her feet began to suddenly sweaty furiously! Gallons of sweat literally drained down her massive feet! Her feet were about to be completely wet in sweat! Sweat dripped down below her feet, forming a puddle of her foot sweat! “Alright slave! Lick lick lick up all the sweat from my feet!” Your body was still under her control, and unwillingly went to her left foot first. You walked through the puddle of sweat to reach her foot. You thought you were gonna be sick! And there you were, standing right in front of her massive, soaked foot! You tried everything in your power to prevent you from doing this, but sadly it didn’t work! Instead your body stuck your tongue wide out and dragged it across the massive length of her foot!

You choked a cry! She was right! You could taste every bit of texture from her sweaty foot! Your tongue felt like it was burning! The liquid tasted so awful! All you could taste was salty sweat, gallons and gallons of salty sweat! You made dramatic noises of disgust as you dragged your tongue left and right, up and down, licking all the parts of her foot you could reach, and you couldn’t reach much! The bunny spoke for her again. “Hehehe! It tickles! Hahaha!” Does she really have to type in everything she wants to say into the bunny? That was your least concern right now as many giant sweat droplets fell straight into your mouth as you licked! You gagged and choked on them as you were forced to swallow them down! Why do you have to be put up in this torture!? You didn’t keep track of time but it felt like a long while of just you continually licking the bottom half of her salty, fowl sole! “Hehehe! It feels so nice! Hmm? It seems you can’t reach the upper part of my foot! Let me help!”

Suddenly, Miaya began to lower her foot down as if she was going to crush you! Your body went confused and accidentally slipped on the puddle of foot sweat and fell into it! Your body got covered in foot sweat, as if it wasn’t soaked in sweat already! You didn’t realize at first but Miaya’s giant foot was lowering down on you, then stopped at the angle of almost crushing you! You were closed in between her giant sweat foot and the puddle of her foot sweat! It smelled so salty and unpleasant! “There you go! Now get to licking the upper part now! And don’t forget to lick my toes too!” She wiggled her giant, sweaty toes, almost hitting your small head! You realized you had more worship to do and your body crawled over and began to lick up her huge, salty arch! God it tasted so salty and fowl! The taste still burning your tongue! Your body had to crawl around under her foot to lick new places, sliding in the puddle of foot sweat you were wedged under! You grimaced and retched but it never got any better!

Meanwhile, in reality...

You were still sitting in the chair with all of your gear still on and with your eyes closed. Miaya was right in front of you, placing her little feet all around your face. You obediently licked her feet, not knowing what was going on since you were still licking her giant virtual sweaty feet in the virtual world. Miaya was hinting a smile across her face as you licked her feet wherever you licked her feet in the virtual world. Miaya was watching you on the big screen, typing whatever she wanted to say to you. “Lick lick lick! Drink up all the sweat! It feels so good! Hehehe! Mmmmmmm! I could keep this going forever!”

Back to the virtual world...

“I could keep this going forever!” Miaya said. Your heart sank after her comment! Yet you kept licking her huge incredibly sweaty feet! After hours and hours of licking her unbearable salty arch and forefoot, you began to dread as your body moved up to her toes next! They were the sweatiest! Her toenails were painted light blue. There was sweaty gunk under her toenails! It made you want throw up at first sight! Your head went to face her massive big toe! Her big toe was 4 times larger than your head! The sweat droplets that ran down her massive toe almost touched your nose! The stench was horrifying! Your tongue stuck out. You shed a tear and licked up her big toe. You tasted every bit of texture on her sweaty toe, and it was beyond awful! You ran your tongue all around her terribly salty toe, licking up all the stale sweat! When you finished licking her big toe your head then went to her toenail and licked the gunk out of it! You retched and retched! You wanted to throw up so badly as you licked all of the gunk out and were forced to swallow all of it down!

When you were done cleaning her big toe, then came what was in between it. The toe jam! The cheesy looking substance was too nasty to even look at! Miaya squeezed her giant toes together, scrunching up all of her toe jam, making you want to 100% throw up everything! And you had to clean it out! With your tongue!! There was nothing you could do! Your head went to the first crevice filled with the hellish substance and you stuck your tongue out! Hell began. You whined so much and shedded so many tears! Your tongue dug into the substance, making you taste a fate worse than death! It tasted so unbelievably terrible, and there was so much you had to clean out! You tongue scooped it up bit by bit and you swallowed it all down, gagging all the way! Why would anyone put someone through this torture!?

You kept licking and eating her toe jam out of her first toe crevice for what seemed like forever to you! When you were finally done you felt sweet relief, only to have it crushed by the next toe crevice full of hellish toe jam! You had to eat all of the time jam from all of her crevices, and it was so mentally painful! But after an hour, you were finally done! Her giant foot was finally clean! You felt like you could die in heaven! “Wooo! One foot down! One more foot to go!” Your body froze in fear! One more foot to go! You saw her other giant nightmarish foot, still horribly sweaty as ever! Miaya wiggle her giant toes in a playful tone, letting you see more sweat and toe jam to eat! You felt like you could die in hell now! Your body went to her other monster, starting the whole hell all over again!

It was clean now! After more hours of fresh pure hell you couldn’t believe that was over! You cleaned her other foot completely! No more sweat, no more toes, no more toe jam! You were crying tears of joy! “Yay! Both of my feet are now clean! Time to spice my feet up again for you lick clean again!” ...You felt despair.

“Now what should I do next?”

1443.content:

Every product that I will bring to you will be foot related! Each one has its own unique flavor from my feet! You’re going to eat every last bite of each product that I bring to you! Foot related!? You didn’t want to do this at all!

Ruruka told you to wait here, so your body followed her command. You couldn’t move a muscle! All you could do was sit on the floor and wait for her to come back. You dreaded! When the time came, Ruruka was back. She had a grey tray in her hands. On the tray was a pile of green jello and a spoon. “I’m back! Look what I brought just for you!” You saw the jello. You were filled with dread as you took the spoon and took a scoop of the green jello! You hooded the spoon up to your face and put the jello in your mouth. This is what I like to call foot jello! 30 minutes of just me rubbing my uncleaned and sweaty feet all around the jello. Green jello mixed with foot sweat, foot grime, dead foot skin flakes, and a couple of other things.” Your face was shocked in pure disgust! Your eyes cringed! You wanted to spit it out so badly, but your body remembers Ruruka’s command! “Your gonna eat every last bite of every product I bring you!” You wanted to cry!

You chewed and swallowed down the revolting jello, shivering in disgust! Then you took another spoon full of the jello and put it in your mouth! You had to eat all of it! One by one you kept taking spoonfuls of the terrible foot jello and eating every spoonful, moaning in complete disgust all the way, until you finally ate all of the gross jello! You felt relief! “Looks like your all done! So I’ll go get the next product! Wait right there!” Your heart sank! It wasn’t over yet! Ruruka left to go bring out another horrible foot pastry, leaving you just to sit on the floor and wait for another nightmare! She came back with another tray. This time she had chocolate pudding, at least you were hoping it was chocolate!

Your body knew what to do. You grabbed the spoon, took a spoonful of pudding, and plunged it into your mouth! After second of swooshing it around your mouth you suddenly tasted the disgusting foot part! If felt strangely crunchy and gross in your mouth! It was like something was in the pudding! The pudding itself mostly didn’t even taste like pudding! It tasted so nasty!

What you’re mostly tasting is mud and dirt from my uncleaned feet! I hope you enjoy it!” You panicked! You were eating mud and dirt from her feet! You screamed in the pudding you were eating! You wanted to throw up so bad, but your body kept on eating! “Make sure you get a good taste of every mouthful of pudding you eat! And also you don’t need that spoon so you? From now on you’ll just take bites out of the pudding ok!”

Hearing her command, just when you were about to swallow it down, your tongue starts to lick all over it, tasting mud and bits of dirt! You tasted every inch of the horrible pudding! Your tastebuds were covered in foot mud and dirt! Then you swallowed the toxic substance down, gagging! Then you went for more of the pudding, but not with your spoon anymore! Your head went up to the pudding and took a bite out of it, leaving pudding all over your face! You then began to thoroughly lick and taste the pudding you were eating! You whimpered! This process continued the same way with you whimpering all the way until no more pudding was left! You then licked the tray, cleaning off any leftover foot pudding! This is hell!

Finally the nightmare pudding was gone! “Time for the next dish!” Ruruka went to get more food. When will this hell end!? The pudding made you wanna throw up so badly! Ruruka came back, this time with cheesecake. “Here’s your next dish!” Ruruka held the tray of cheesecake out right in front of your face. It smelled so horrible! Like rotten cheese and nasty foot odor! “Like the smell? Why don’t you take a big whiff of it!” Hearing her order, you began to inhale the aroma deeply, filling your nose with the rancid, intoxicating stench! You coughed out loud! Ruruka giggled. “If you think that’s bad wait until you taste it!” What could taste worse than that foot pudding!?

“Go ahead. Plunge your face into the cheesecake and get a good mouthful!” You plunged your face into the cake and took a big bite like she ordered, getting your face covered in the horrible smelling product! You began to chew and rub your tongue all over. You retched loudly! Your faced grimaced! This actually was worse than the pudding! It tasted like rotten cheese, vile milk, and salty vinegar as your tongue ran all over it! “Behold! My toe jam cheesecake! All I did was make cheescake and added another ingredient into the mix! A jar of my funky gross toe jam which I’ve been saving up! I have a lot of it you know! Then I put it in the oven to bake. I also had someone make a tube on my oven so I could get my awful foot stench in the oven while it was baking! And wala! My special made toe jam cheesecake!”

It just kept getting worse and worse for every product! You tasted crusty and slimy toe gunk! It tasted like hell! Your face was covered in cheesecake, making you smell the god awful stench of it while you ate! This is so cruel! “My toe jam really is bad! Here, take a look!” Ruruka took off one of her boots to reveal her barefoot. Her barefoot looked so revolting! You saw her toe jam between her toes! It was orange and slimy! Oh god why!? You kept retching and gagging! “I know right? Gross!” Ruruka put her boot back on. “Oh well. Keep eating!” You kept eating and smelling the terrible cheesecake, retching and plunging your face into it to get more mouthfuls! What was wrong with this person!? You ate all the cheesecake and licked the rest off the plate. It was all gone! You finished it all! Please let be over!

“Nice job! I’m surprised you’ve made it this far! But now it’s time for the final dish!” Oh thank god! “The most awful, horrible, disgusting dish I have to offer!” Your heart sank! She has to be serious! Ruruka went to get it. She came back with a big cake! “Here it is!” She set it down in front of you. It was white and didn’t look so bad, but you knew that it was a disguise! “Now eat! Eat to your hearts content!” And with that, you plunged you face into the cake, took a big bite, and began to chew! You immediately screamed and retched loudly! It tasted beyond hell!

“This is the foot cake! I actually got help from Seiko and a teacher named Chisa. Made with regular ingredients, but also mixed with foot sweat, dirt, grime, toejam, dead foot skin flakes, toenails, and just plainly feet from all of us! We made sure we got our feet all sweaty and uncleaned! While making it we stomped and rubbed are gross feet all over. We scraped stuff off our feet and cut our toenails. Seiko even added a special chemical that makes you taste it even more like gross feet! And you’re gonna eat all of it! So get digging!” You wanted to die so badly! This tasted worse than hell! Yet you kept eating it, tasting every hellish and disgusting thing Ruruka mentioned, crying and retching along the way! Never once did it got any better! The chemical made the taste more unbearable! You chewed and swallowed chunks of the cake down, gagging and fetching every time!

It took hours to eat all of it! It was big so there was much to eat! Every moment was just pain and torture! After hours and hours you somehow managed to eat the whole vile foot cake! You felt happiness! It was over! Finally! “Wow. You actually ate all of it! I beyond impressed! You really are an impressive slave! I have no more treats for you.” Finally over! “But now we can finally do the other things that I planned for you! All foot related! Isn’t that great!” Your face turned pale! The nightmare is never over! This is madness!

“Now let’s see...”

Write stories about girls from Danganronpa where you are their slave and worshipping their feet!

The main character must be either 1st or 2nd person point of view! Ex: 1st(I, my) 2nd:(You, your)

No getting turned on or liking feet! The character must hate it!

Sweaty, gross, dirty, etc. is all allowed!

Make each chapter long and good!

Think of good stuff!

Have fun!
